messages.subject: Re: PMK Contest Deadline Extension
messages.msgSnippet: (sigh)...this wasn t on their main website---only as a livejournal entry...had I known I would have went out and bought a new black marker geez...come on
messages.messageBody:
(sigh)...this wasn't on their main website---only as a livejournal
entry...had I known I would have went out and bought a new black
marker geez...come on everyone enter...we will overwhelm them with our
sheer numbers!!!

You can do whatever you want with my fanart...I always put my stuff in
the Photos section under "illustrations"

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "unsafesects" <mindglue@i...>
wrote:
> For those who are interested in the PMK Fanfic/Fanart contest at:
>
> http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/
>
> The deadline has been extended to May 31!
>
> You have plenty of time to get those entries in. :D
>
> Angrybee.

messages.subject: PMK Contest Deadline Extension
messages.msgSnippet: For those who are interested in the PMK Fanfic/Fanart contest at: http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/ The deadline has been extended to May 31! You have
messages.messageBody:
For those who are interested in the PMK Fanfic/Fanart contest at:

http://peacemakerfancontest.bravehost.com/

The deadline has been extended to May 31!

You have plenty of time to get those entries in. :D

Angrybee.
